subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
In [[bronze]] [[script]], written as {{zh-l|悊}} and other variants, with no evidence of the existence of {{zh-l|哲}} until [[small]] [[seal script]]. In ''{{zh-l|說文解字}}'', described as a {{Han compound|折|口|t2=mouth|ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s}} .
